item.content:encoded: 35.50 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a king size double bed). This room is located upstairs and has a Moroccan living room, bathroom with bathtub in blue Zellij de Fes, mini bar, air conditioning, satellite TV, safe and telephone.

item.title: Ba Sidi
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 20 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a double bed, king size). This room is located upstairs with views of the patio, has two single beds and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath of Fez.
item.content:encoded: 20 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a double bed, king size). This room is located upstairs with views of the patio, has two single beds and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath of Fez.

item.title: Suite La Concubine
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 34 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the first floor and has a beautiful view of the corridors of the riad. It has a cedar canopy bed carved in the Fassi tradition. You can also relax in the typical lounge. The bathroom has a bathtub decorated in blue zellige […]
item.content:encoded:
34 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the first floor and has a beautiful view of the corridors of the riad. It has a cedar canopy bed carved in the Fassi tradition.
You can also relax in the typical lounge. The bathroom has a bathtub decorated in blue zellige of Fez.

item.title: Suite Lalla Fatima
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 35 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the ground floor with an opening to the large patio and the central marble fountain. It has a cedarwood canopy bed, a traditional Moroccan living room and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath from Fez.
item.content:encoded:
35 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the ground floor with an opening to the large patio and the central marble fountain.
It has a cedarwood canopy bed, a traditional Moroccan living room and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath from Fez.

item.title: Suite La Matrimoniale
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 35 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the ground floor with an opening to the large patio and the central marble fountain. It has a cedar wood canopy bed, a traditional Moroccan living room and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath from Fez.
item.content:encoded:
35 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the ground floor with an opening to the large patio and the central marble fountain.

It has a cedar  wood canopy bed, a traditional Moroccan living room and a bathroom with a blue zellige bath from Fez.

item.title: Suite Le Caid
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 35 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is on the first floor has a beautiful view of the interiors of the Riad and a bathroom with a blue zellige bathtub of Fez. This suite has a connecting door to the Jouhara room and is ideal for families with children.
item.content:encoded: 35 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is on the first floor has a beautiful view of the interiors of the Riad and a bathroom with a blue zellige bathtub of Fez. This suite has a connecting door to the Jouhara room and is ideal for families with children.

item.title: Suite Le Vizir
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 45 square meters – 1 king size bed. By far, this suite is the largest in the Riad, it has a four-poster cedarwood bed, a typical Moroccan living room, a dressing room and a bathroom with a blue zellige bathtub of Fez.
item.content:encoded: 45 square meters – 1 king size bed. By far, this suite is the largest in the Riad, it has a four-poster cedarwood bed, a typical Moroccan living room, a dressing room and a bathroom with a blue zellige bathtub of Fez.

item.title: Suite La Favorite
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 39 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the first floor and has a beautiful view of the corridors of the riad. The bed is cedar, the living room is decorated in the traditional style of Fez.
item.content:encoded:
39 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the first floor and has a beautiful view of the corridors of the riad.

The bed is cedar, the living room is decorated in the traditional style of Fez.
